trans-unit.source: Provides a dialog box, which prompts for account information of a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en dialogboks som ber om kontoinformasjon for en Windows-tjenesteprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Normally, you do not use the ServiceInstallerDialog class directly within your code; this dialog is generally used by the installation utility for a Windows Service application.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis bruker du ikke klassen ServiceInstallerDialog direkte fra koden; Denne dialogboksen brukes vanligvis av verktøyet installasjonen for en Windows-tjenesteprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller> object has the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> set to `User`, and either the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> is an empty string (""), then the installation utility uses ServiceInstallerDialog to prompt for these values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis en <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>objektet har den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A>satt til `User`, og enten den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A>eller <xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A>er en tom streng (""), og deretter installere verktøyet bruker ServiceInstallerDialog til å be om disse verdiene.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller.Account%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.ServiceProcessInstaller>

trans-unit.source: ServiceInstallerDialog derives from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class methods and properties to display and manipulate the dialog.
trans-unit.target: ServiceInstallerDialog er avledet fra <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>; Bruk av <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>klasse metoder og egenskaper for å vise og endre dialogboksen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: For example, use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to display the form, and then check the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> before validating the input text for the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel bruke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>å vise skjemaet, og deretter kontrollere den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>før validering av inndatateksten for den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog does not check the credentials and privileges for the specified account.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > ServiceInstallerDialog kontrollerer ikke rettigheter og tillatelser for den angitte kontoen.

trans-unit.source: For example, the user might enter an invalid account name and password for the computer, or the account might not have the correct privileges to run as a service.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel brukeren kan angi en ugyldig kontonavn og passord for datamaskinen, eller kontoen har ikke riktig tillatelse til å kjøre som en tjeneste.

trans-unit.source: Validate the user input to ensure that the installed service runs successfully.
trans-unit.target: Validere brukerinndata for å sikre at installert tjenesten kjøres på riktig måte.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av tjenesten kontoen skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: A new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form has its <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> set to <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> set to an empty string (""), and the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> set to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: En ny <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>skjemaet har den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A>satt til <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>satt til en tom streng (""), og <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>satt til en tom streng.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Result%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: Begins running a standard application message loop and displays the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Starter kjører en standard programmet meldingsløkke og skjemaet for konto for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to calling <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> on a new <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form; it is typically used for testing purposes.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden tilsvarer kaller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>på en ny <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>utgjør; brukes vanligvis for testformål.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> on the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> form to display the dialog box in your application.
trans-unit.target: Kall <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>på den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>skjemaet for å vise dialogboksen i programmet.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the password for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir passordet for tjenesten kontoen skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and Password values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>ikke validere den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>og passord verdier.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: The dialog checks that the user confirms the password, but it does not authenticate the account credentials on the computer.
trans-unit.target: Dialogboksen kontrollerer at brukeren bekrefter passordet, men den ikke godkjenne legitimasjonen for tjenestekontoen på datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: A string representing the password in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer passordet i konto-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").

trans-unit.source: Gets the dialog result for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Henter Dialogresultatet for tjenesten kontoen skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A> to prompt the user for the service installation account, then check the Result value.
trans-unit.target: Bruk <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>for å be bruker om tjenestekontoen for installasjon, Kontroller verdien som resultat.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.ShowDialog%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the value is <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, verify that the input <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> are valid.
trans-unit.target: Hvis verdien er <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>, kontroller at inndataene <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A>og <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>er gyldige.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Username%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"></xref> indicating the user response to the dialog box.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialogResult"> </xref> som angir brukersvar til dialogboksen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_OK" name="OK" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the user name for the service account form.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir brukernavn for tjenesten kontoen skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog> does not validate the Username or <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> values.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>kan ikke valideres brukernavnet eller <xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A>verdier.</xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog.Password%2A> </xref:System.ServiceProcess.Design.ServiceInstallerDialog>

trans-unit.source: A string representing the user name in the service account form.
trans-unit.target: En streng som representerer brukernavnet i konto-skjemaet.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng ("").
